avdta.network.node

Class PhaseRecord

  • java.lang.Object
    • avdta.network.node.PhaseRecord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<PhaseRecord>

    public class PhaseRecord
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<PhaseRecord>
    A record of a Phase used to represent and manipulate the data used to construct a Phase.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                   double time_green,
                   java.util.List<TurnRecord> turns)
        Constructs this PhaseRecord with all data
        Parameters:
        node - the Node this Phase is used for
        sequence - the sequence this Phase occurs in the signal cycle
        time_red - the all red time
        time_yellow - the yellow time
        time_green - the green time
        turns - list of allowed Turns

      • getSequence

        public int getSequence()
        Returns the sequence this Phase occurs in the signal cycle. Phases for the same Node must have unique sequences.
        Returns:
        the sequence this Phase occurs in the signal cycle

        Parameters:
        seq - the new sequence

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(PhaseRecord rhs)
        Orders this PhaseRecord with respect to other PhaseRecords. PhaseRecords are sorted according to Node, then according to getSequence().
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<PhaseRecord>
        Parameters:
        rhs - the PhaseRecord to compare against
        Returns:
        whether this PhaseRecord should be before or after rhs
